title: Nested conditional in minOfThree - write code

content.question: Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the method works as intended?

choices.label: if (a <= b) { if (a <= c) { return a; } else { return c; } } else { return b; }
if (a <= b) { if (a <= c) { return a; } else if (b <= c) { return b; } } else { return c; }
if (a <= b || a <= c) { return a; } else if (b <= a || b <= c) { return b; } else { return c; }
if (a <= b && a <= c) { return a; } else if (b <= a && b <= c) { return b; } else { return c; }

content.answer: if (a <= b && a <= c) { return a; } else if (b <= a && b <= c) { return b; } else { return c; }

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
